E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 8/18/1991
Subject: Troy O'Leary healing process
Troy O'Leary is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 8/18/1991
Subject: Progress of Tony Clark
Dear Sir,
Tony Clark has an AVG of .294 at A Palm Springs Angels!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 8/29/1991
Subject: Tony Clark learns new position
Tony Clark has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
